mapper.select: select cnt.cateNo, cnt.cateName, cnt.description, cnt.postNo from (select c.cateNo, cateName, description, count(postNo) as postNo from category c left outer join post p on c.cateNo = p.cateNo and id = #{id} group by c.cateNo, cateName, description order by c.cateNo desc ) cnt
select cateNo, id, cateName from category where id = #{id} order by regDate desc
